quests.name: Use Your Imagination: EVE
objectives: Go inside the Ancient Ruins in the Docks area.
Follow EVE to the Time Rift.
Make sure the Film Projector is in your Inventory
Bring the Film Projector to EVE.

Take the following pictures of EVE and WALL-E together for the film reel:
  ‧ Inside the Ancient Ruins.
  ‧ Inside WALL-E's House.
  ‧ Inside EVE's House.

Gather the following materials for the film reel:
  ‧ 8 Plastic Scrap.
  ‧ 3 Mechanical Parts.
Craft the Film Reel at a Crafting Station.
Make sure the film reel is in your Inventory.
Give the Film Reel to EVE.
Meet EVE and WALL-E at the Time Rift in the Ancient Ruins.
